price: 64. Ezali ye te oyo abandaka bokeli sima azongeli yango? Mpe nani azali koleisa bino kowuta na likolo mpe na mabele? Boye ezali na nzambe mosusu elongo na Allah? Loba: Bopesa bilembetele bia bino soki bozali na bosôló.
arabic: أَمَّن يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ وَمَن يَرۡزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ قُلۡ هَاتُواْ بُرۡهَٰنَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: amman yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu waman yarzuqukum mina al-samāi wal-arḍi a-ilāhun maʿa al-lahi qul hātū bur'hānakum in kuntum ṣādiqīna
